fileheader.author: from template (Aeromatic), Gérard Robin, and Alva
fileheader.version: Version 1.4 better data from Naca Doc
fileheader.note:
This model was created using publicly available data, publicly available technical reports, textbooks, and guesses. It contains no proprietary or restricted data. It has been validated only to the extent that it seems to "fly right", and possibly to comply to published, publicly known, performance data (maximum speed, endurance, etc.). Thus, this model is meant for educational and entertainment purposes only.
This simulation model is not endorsed by the manufacturer.
fileheader.documentation:
http://aeronavale.free.fr/avion_crusader.htm ********************************************************************* Vought F-8E (FN) Crusader : Caractéristiques principales Constructeur Ling-Temco-Vought Mission Interception tout temps Envergure 10.72 m Longueur 16.61 m Hauteur 4.80 m Surface alaire 34.84 m2 Poids max 13 000 kg Moteur 1 réacteur J 57 P 20 A Pratt et Whitney Vitesse max Mach 1.8 Vitesse de croisière 860 km/h Vitesse d'appontage 180 km/h (97kt) Plafond 50.000 pieds Distance franchissable 1 500 nautiques Autonomie 2 h 30 ******************************************************************************** http://www.vought.com/heritage/products/html/f8u-2spec.html
Data below for F-8C Dimensions Wingspan 35.17 ft Overall Langth 55.25 ft Height 15.75 ft Weights and Capacities Empty Weight 18950 lb Fuel Capacity 1348 gal
Powerplant Characteristics Type: Pratt Whitney J57-P16 Rating Thrust 10700 lb Rating Thrust with afterburner 16900 lb
Performance Maximum Speed, Sea Level 1105 mph
********************************************************************** http://www.aerospaceweb.org/aircraft/fighter/f8/
Data below for F-8P Last modified 14 November 2004 HISTORY: First Flight (XF-8U-1) 25 March 1955 (F-8A) 20 September 1955 Service Entry March 1957 Retirement 4 December 1999 AIRFOIL SECTIONS: Wing Root NACA 65A006 mod Wing Tip NACA 65A005 mod DIMENSIONS: Length 54.50 ft (16.61 m) Wingspan 35.17 ft (10.72 m) Height 15.75 ft (4.80 m) Wing Area 374 ft2 (34.84 m2) WEIGHTS: Empty 19,700 lb (8,935 kg) Typical Load 27,560 lb (12,500 kg) Max Takeoff 34,000 lb (15,420 kg) Fuel Capacity internal: 5,300 L PROPULSION: Powerplant one Pratt Whitney J57-P-20A afterburning turbojet Thrust 18,000 lb (80.07 kN) PERFORMANCE: Max Level Speed at altitude: 1,225 mph (1,975 km/h) at 40,000 ft (12,190 m), Mach 1.86 at sea level: unknown Initial Climb Rate 21,000 ft (6,410 m) / min Service Ceiling unknown Range typical: 380 nm (710 km) ferry: 1,040 nm (1,930 km) g-Limits unknown ARMAMENT: Gun four 20-mm Colt cannons (84 to 144 rds ea) Stations four external hardpoints Air-to-Air Missile R.530, Matra 550 Magic, AIM-9 Sidewinder ************************************************************************************************************************* The F-8A entered service in March of 1957. Length: 55' 3" Height: 15' 9" Wingspan (spread) 35' 8" Wing area: 375 sq. ft. NACA 65A006 mod
F-8E Empty Wt: 19,200 Max Launch Wt: 34,100 Max Trap Wt: 22,000 Approach speed @max: 140 kts Stall, pwr. on/off 123/145 kts JP-5, internal-gal/lb: 1,348/9,100 Engine: PW J-57-P.... 16 Thrust, MRT/CRT, #: 10,700/18,000 Guns: 4-20mm, 500 rds Missiles: 4 Sidewinder Max Speed, IMN/mph**: 1.9/1,255 Combat Radius, nm: 355 Service Ceiling, MRT 40,000'
*************************************************************************
from http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/F-8_Crusader # Dry thrust: 10,700 lbf (47.6 kN) # Thrust with afterburner: 18,000 lbf (80.1 kN) Airfoil: NACA 65A006 mod root, NACA 65A005 mod tip Zero-lift drag coefficient: 0.0133 # Drag area: 5.0 ft² (0.46 m²) # Aspect ratio: 3.42

************************************************************************** >>>>>>>The very first version ( right now, outdated) was :File: f8e.xml Author: template Aero-Matic v 8 Adons from Gerard Robin 07-10-2005 (jj mm aa) with an original carrier landing patch (from Mathias Froëhlich) Inputs: name: Vought F-8E Crusader type: single-engine transonic/supersonic fighter max weight: 34100 lb wing span: 35.17232 ft length: 54.49741 ft wing area: 375.0526 sq-ft gear type: tricycle retractable?: yes # engines: 1 engine type: turbine engine layout: aft fuselage yaw damper? yes Outputs: wing loading: 90.92 lb/sq-ft CL-alpha: 3.5 per radian CL-0: 0.08 CL-max: 1 CD-0: 0.021 K: 0.09 >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> ******************************************************************************
